title: Magic Michael
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: A story film for children, based on Louis Slobodkin’s book. “Michael wasn’t happy just being my brother, he wanted to be something - something or other.” Michael turns himself into anything from a pup to a bear or a chair. This story about an imaginative little boy is told in rhyming couplets, with visuals based on the original illustrations to the book. Storyteller: Owen Jordan.
